I did upload a lot more light gun games than this, but TPB seems to have deleted most of the torrents for some reason.

Also, for those interested, there are now 16 PS2 games that use light gun(s):

Cocoto Fun Fair, Dino Stalker, Endgame, Guncom 2, Gun Fighter 2, Gunvari Collection (Japanese PS2 port of Point Blank 1-3 and Time Crisis for PSX), Ninja Assault, Resident Evil: Dead Aim, Resident Evil: Code Veronica, Starsky & Hutch, Time Crisis 2, Time Crisis 3, Time Crisis: Crisis Zone, Vampire Night and Virtua Cop (this torrent).
